radiographic_examinations.findings: New small bilateral effusions; moderate cardiomegaly unchanged; well-defined 3.9 x 2.6 cm hypodensity in posterior right dome of the liver likely representing a cyst; multiple subcentimeter hypodensities in both kidneys likely representing cysts; intra-abdominal loops of bowel grossly unremarkable; pigtail catheter in right lower quadrant rim enhancing fluid collection measuring 2 x 1.2 cm; associated cecal wall thickening to 1 cm and lymphadenopathy measuring up to 1.3 cm unchanged; no free air noted; extensive atherosclerotic calcified and noncalcified mural thrombus.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Cecal wall thickening and lymphadenopathy unchanged; moderate cardiomegaly unchanged.
